title: Movie Night Special
description: Get 50% off on all movie tickets every Monday and Tuesday.

title: Student Discount
description: Students get 20% off on movie tickets upon showing a valid student ID.

title: Combo Deal
description: Enjoy a popcorn and soft drink combo at a discounted price of $11.

title: Family Package
description: Bring your family and enjoy a special package including 4 movie tickets, popcorn, and drinks.

title: Senior Citizen Discount
description: Seniors aged 60 and above get 30% off on movie tickets.

title: Kids Special
description: Kids aged under 12 watch for free for every ticket purchased.
